Room.Name: Keslar Mountain Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a narrow mountain trail leading up the strange mountain.
Room.LongDescription: To the west, you can see the great Necropolis. From this high up, you can see just how big the Necropolis is. It must span about three city blocks square. The path up the mountain continues towards the top of the mountain and towards the Palace. To the north, you can see the gate that you originally used to get in.
